actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to extend the authority of the Federal Reserve banks to buy and sell certain obligations.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to extend the authority of Federal Reserve banks to purchase and sell direct obligations of the United States and obligations fully guaranteed by the United States until May 1, 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to extend the authority of the Federal Reserve banks to buy and sell certain obligations.
